solution_line_template: The supplies for every student will cost {bow_cost} + {vinegar_cost} + {baking_soda_cost} = $<<{bow_cost}+{vinegar_cost}+{baking_soda_cost}={cost_per_student}>>{cost_per_student}.
The supplies for the whole class will cost {cost_per_student} * {num_students} = $<<{cost_per_student}*{num_students}={total_cost}>>{total_cost} in total.
